text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Ugh...
I'm sorry, Trainer, I lost.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
It's frustrating, but
this is my current ability, isn't it...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Whoa! Thank you for
the kind words!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
That's right, the current me isn't my limit!
I'm still just ordinary among the ordinary!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
From today, I'll work hard on training again!
My immediate goal is ordinary but a bit above ordinary!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Alright! I'll build up the strength to win
first place by the next race!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Please help me think about
what kind of training I should do!
